name: Bitcoin
description: Bitcoin is the first decentralized cryptocurrency, launched in 2009 by Satoshi Nakamoto.

name: Ethereum
description: Ethereum is a blockchain-based platform for smart contracts and decentralized applications (DApps).

name: Litecoin
description: Litecoin is a peer-to-peer cryptocurrency created by Charlie Lee in 2011.

name: Tether
description: Tether (USDT) is a stablecoin pegged to the US dollar, providing price stability in crypto trading.
